name: Campfire (Platonaizer)
description:
You're in dark and cold forest. Your only goal is to survive. You get cold and decide to build a campfire. Warning: this game is a  prototype and may contain bugs. Please write your comment and tell us what you want to see in this game if this game will be popular, i will continue to develop this game in the next versions i'm going to add: - sticks - story - score - boosts  - mechanics Tips: - Find the logs and throw them into the campfire. - Do not stray far from the road, so as not to get lost. - But the logs are placed deep in the forest. - Don't let the campfire go out. - Use the logs wisely.

Controls:

Use     [W]  to move

                                                                                  [A] [S] [D]

[Space] to jump

[E] to take logs

[Q] to throw logs into the campfire

[Esc] to open main menu
